item.title: World Cup Player Caps and Clubs
item.description: World Cup Player Caps and Clubs This is post three in a series using data for all World Cup teams collected in the first post In the second post we looked explored the ages of players over time, by team and by position as well as checked to see if there was a skewed distribution among birth months. For this post we will look at caps which is the term used for counting how many appearances a player has made for games at the international level.

item.title: All World Cup Squads
item.description: World Cup 2018 is Finally Here A Quick Analysis of all Teams It has been a long, long 1,423 days since the conclusion of the last World Cup. Luckily, this long wait is almost over which means it is time to analyze everything and anything World Cup related. In this post, let’s start with getting all the squads. We will gather all the team data from the Wikipedia page.
